sources.name: SQL_FLIGHT_TABLE
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  SQL_FLIGHT_TABLE

sources.name: Flt_nbr_range_matrix
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  Flt_nbr_range_matrix

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared SQL_FLIGHT_TABLE = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("eal-assqldb-d.database.windows.net", "EDW", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "SF_FLIGHT_PROD"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared Flt_nbr_range_matrix = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://ealmain.blob.core.windows.net/flight-number-range/FLT_NBR_RANGE.xlsx"),
  Excel = Excel.Workbook(AdfDoc),
  ExcelSheet = Excel{[Item = "FLT_NBR_RANGE", Kind = "Sheet"]}[Data],
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(ExcelSheet, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = SQL_FLIGHT_TABLE
in
  Source;
